profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Quality and Information Security Management including Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC), of a 600+ staff Service Assurance organisation in five global locations. 
- Headed up an international virtual team to ensure compliance with ISO 9001/27001 standards. 
- Led greenfield implementations of integrated ISO 9001 Quality and ISO/IEC 27001 Information Security Management Systems in Ostrava, CZ (350 staff), and Manila, PH (600 staff).
- Coordinated and executed various Lean Six Sigma projects. 
- Agile Product Owner of Service Management Reporting platform. 
- Developed and managed Risk Management, Information Security Incident Management and Continual Improvement processes.
- Led the project to get Verizon TISAX certified.
- Rolled out process mining platform (UiPath) in Global Service Assurance.
profile_positions.title: Quality and Information Security Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the enhancement of services delivered by Verizon's Global Operations organisations, including:
•	Set up and managed the ITIL Competence Centre, an off-shored and outsourced group of 50 people responsible for the administrative aspects of a number of ITSM processes, including Change Management, Request Fulfilment, Capacity Management, Service Reporting, Asset Management.
•	Headed several EMEA-wide service improvement projects: Agile development of Service Management Reporting platform; Operational readiness for Software-Defined services; Improvement of Engineering-Operations cooperation; Automation of Network Engineering processes.
•	ITIL Best Practices Programme: definition of ITIL best practices and production of practical support materials to support Verizon's largest customer programmes to implement these processes.
•	ITSM Maturity Assessments: developed a methodology to assess the largest EMEA service delivery programmes on their IT Service Management capability and maturity. Led a team of ITIL Experts to perform the assessments and provide recommendations for process improvements to the Programme Directors.
profile_positions.title: Manager Service Enhancements and Innovation

profile_positions.description:
Senior management position, leading an organisation with up to 180 staff in various countries in EMEA focussing on network engineering for Verizon's managed and outsourced customers. Expertise within the organisation ranges from WAN and LAN to IP Telephony, Data Centre and DNS, DHCP, IPAM engineering.

Selected Achievements:

- Headed international engineering team of over 170 engineers and ten managers.
- Functioned as the most senior representative of the Engineering organisation in EMEA to internal organisations and customers. 
- Developed and enhanced business and ITSM processes.
- Introduced new Integral Performance and Talent Management methodologies.
- Formed strategic partnership with leading DNS, DHCP and IPAM vendor.
- Expanded team significantly in Eastern Europe, including offshoring activities..
profile_positions.title: Associate Director Global Engineering Solutions EMEA

profile_positions.description:
This is a continuation of my previous position at MCI, now that MCI and Verizon have merged.
Activities involve managing the engineering efforts in EMEA and APAC for major outsourcing deals for financial institutes. This involves dealing with integration of transferred staff from those companies into Verizon Business, technical architecture and implementation, people management, business management, strategic partnership with customers.
As of September 2009, also functioning as "Chief Engineer" for the ABN AMRO and RBS networks, being end-responsible for the design and architecture of their worldwide networks that we manage for them.
profile_positions.title: Manager Global Engineering Solutions
